text: John Moriarty (September 30, 1930 – January 5, 2022) was an American conductor and stage director. He worked on productions at opera companies throughout the United States. He was born in Fall River, Massachusetts. He was piano soloist with the Boston Pops, the Boston Civic Symphony, and the Radio Éireann Orchestra of Dublin. Moriarty died on January 5, 2022 at his home in Fall River at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American conductors Category:American pianists Category:Musicians from Boston Category:Writers from Boston
title: John Moriarty (conductor)
